max_number_of_partition.description: MaxNumPartition Specifies the maximum number of partitions that clients can acquire for this extension instance. Implementation defines how limit exceeding should be handled.

max_number_of_pending_acks_per_partition.description: MaxNumPendingAcksPerPartition Specifies the maximum number of ackIDs and their corresponding status information that are waiting to be queried in each partition.

storage.description: StorageID defines the storage type of the extension. In-memory type is set by default (if not provided). Future consideration is disk type.
